biotools.summary: GO2MSIG generates collections of gene sets in MSigDB format based on the Gene Ontology (GO) project hierarchy and gene association data, for use with the Gene Set Enrichment Analysis (GSEA) implementation available at the Broad Institute. This enables rapid creation of gene set collections for multiple species.

bioschemas.name: GO2MSIG
